name: Hanzo
description: Hanzo’s versatile arrows can reveal his enemies or fragment to strike multiple targets. He can scale walls to fire his bow from on high, or summon a titanic spirit dragon.

abilities.name: Storm Bow
abilities.description: Hanzo nocks and fires an arrow at his target.

abilities.name: Scatter Arrow
abilities.description: Hanzo shoots a fragmenting arrow that ricochets off walls and objects and can strike multiple targets at once.

abilities.name: Sonic Arrow
abilities.description: Hanzo launches an arrow that contains a sonar tracking device. Any enemy within its detection radius is visibly marked, making them easier for Hanzo and his allies to hunt down.

abilities.name: Wall Climb
abilities.description: Hanzo can climb any vertical surface.

abilities.name: Dragonstrike
abilities.description: Hanzo summons a Spirit Dragon which travels through the air in a line. It passes through walls in its way, devouring any enemies it encounters.
